note.p: Career: Went to Australia due to pulmonary problems and began botanical work (1847); Director, Botanical Department of Victoria; Director, Melbourne Botanic Garden (1857-1873); Botanist to the North Australian Overland Exploring Expedition (before 1861); title of Baron conferred on him by the King of Wurtemburg
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1898 vol 63 pp xxxii-xxxvi signed by J D H
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
